helio.materialiser

Class HelioMaterialiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • helio.materialiser.HelioMaterialiser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MaterialiserEngine

    public class HelioMaterialiser
extends java.lang.Object
implements MaterialiserEngine
    This class is an implementation of the interface MaterialiserEngine
    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HelioMaterialiser(HelioMaterialiserMapping mappings)
      This constructor receives a valid HelioMaterialiserMapping object, if provided mapping is empty no RDF will be generated

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      This method closes all the background processes of Helio, for instance, the processes that generate the RDF of asynchronous DataSource
      org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model getRDF()
      This method returns all the triples of the last updated RDF
      org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model getResource(java.lang.String iri)
      This method returns all the triples of the last updated RDF which subject is the one provided
      java.lang.String query(java.lang.String sparqlQuery, SparqlResultsFormat format)
      This method solves the provided SPARQL over the last updated RDF
      java.io.PipedInputStream queryStream(java.lang.String sparqlQuery, SparqlResultsFormat format)
      This method solves the provided SPARQL over the last updated RDF
      java.lang.String transformToString(java.io.PipedInputStream input) 
      void updateSynchronousSources()
      This method updates the RDF of all the synchronous DataSource, if the internal cache is an external triple store the updated triples will be injected in such store

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public void updateSynchronousSources()

        public org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model getResource(java.lang.String iri)

        Description copied from interface: MaterialiserEngine

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        iri - an IRI that identifies a specific resource, i.e., the subject
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • queryStream

        public java.io.PipedInputStream queryStream(java.lang.String sparqlQuery,
                                            SparqlResultsFormat format)
        Description copied from interface: MaterialiserEngine
        This method solves the provided SPARQL over the last updated RDF
        Specified by:
        queryStream in interface MaterialiserEngine
        Parameters:
        sparqlQuery - a valid SPARQL query (SELECT, ASK, DESCRIBE, or CONSTRUCT)
        format - specifies a SparqlResultsFormat format in which the query answer will be expressed
        Returns:
        a InputStream containing the query answers
